text: 23.35 Stt 4.8, 2 Sto 24.20-21, Hib 11.4 Kɨlop anɨgɨnɨgabɨm ak nɨm, nɨbi mɨŋel dɨnɨgabɨm agak. Bɨlel ñɨn ak tɨkɨl, bɨ suŋtep okok kɨlop pel paklel mɨd dad apɨl, mɨñɨl nɨbi anɨb ak tek gebɨm anɨb ak, God gek mɨŋel anɨb okok mɨdupsek dɨnɨgabɨm agak. Mɨŋel anɨb ak nɨm, bɨ suŋtep Ebel nop ned jɨj gɨl paklɨl, ñag dad apɨl, ñag dad apɨl, kɨdek Belekiya ñɨne Sekalaya nop paklɨlak agak. God agnɨgep kal awl ak adaŋ, God nop sɨbogep abañ adek tep ak adaŋ, nop nab sɨŋak paklɨlak agak.
